youCanRetrieve: You can retrieve all your basic information here.
name: Name
setUpYourApplication: Set up your application-wide language preference.
ifYouActivate: If you activate this service, translation to your target language will apply for pages, modules, and table columns as provided by your organization.
updateYourPassword: Update your password associated with your account.
pleaseEnterYourPassword: Please enter your password to confirm you would like to log out from all your devices. Otherwise, it will log you out of current device only.
samePassword: Current and new passwords are identical
passwordShouldBe: Password should be at least 8 characters
onceActivated: Once activated, new notifications will be delivered to your email account.
